name: Beeples: A Beeple Sim
description:
Made for the 2022 GMTK Game Jam

Beeples: A Beeple Sim: 

Controls:
  • WASD to move the camera around
  • QE to rotate the camera 
  •  Hold left mouse click to select units 
  •  Right click to assign tasks (if they are in the middle of another task, it might take a moment for them to put that task down)
The Search for the Sacred Vase 

Beeples is a chill sim game where the ai's behavior is determined by the roll of a dice. Sit back and enjoy the Beeples doing their thing, or intervene and guide them to a new high score.

Game was designed by Jeremiah Plauche (programming) 

& Summer Tomaseski (art) 

with music by Abe Estos

By the way, I did not get around to updating the Windows and Mac builds to 1.7, so they will be slightly worse than the in-browser game (but still playable)
